participant_1.background:
I've been wearing more military-inspired clothing to honor my husband, who recently retired.
my son is a football player.
I went scuba diving in the Great Barrier Reef, which was an amazing experience.
i lost my arm in a car accident.
I need a home that is close to a music venue and has a large backyard for my boys to play in.

participant_2.background:
I got my finger crushed in a machine when I was working at the factory.
I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job.
My family is important to me, but my job is demanding and I don't always get to see them as much as I would like.
I'm single, but I'd love to find someone to share my love of nature with
I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.

content.text: I went scuba diving in the Great Barrier Reef, which was an amazing experience!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to go scuba diving, but I've never had the chance.
It's definitely worth it! The Great Barrier Reef is one of the most amazing places in the world.
I'm sure it is! I've seen pictures of it, and it looks incredible.
It is! I'm so glad I got to experience it.
Me too! What's your favorite thing about scuba diving?
I love being able to see all the amazing marine life up close. It's like being in a whole other world.
That sounds amazing! I'm really jealous.
You should definitely go scuba diving sometime! It's a once in a lifetime experience.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking, biking, and swimming. I also like to read and play video games.
Those all sound like fun activities! I like to do a lot of the same things.
That's great! Maybe we could go hiking together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm always looking for new hiking partners.
Great! We can exchange numbers and make plans.
